team.floracore.plugin

类 FCBukkitBootstrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • team.floracore.plugin.FCBukkitBootstrap
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    LoaderBootstrap, BootstrappedWithLoader, FloraCoreBootstrap

    public class FCBukkitBootstrap
extends java.lang.Object
implements FloraCoreBootstrap, LoaderBootstrap, BootstrappedWithLoader
    Bootstrap plugin for FloraCore running on Bukkit.

      • identifyClassLoader

        public @Nullable java.lang.String identifyClassLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                                               throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        从接口复制的说明: FloraCoreBootstrap
        Attempts to identify the plugin behind the given classloader.

        Used for giving more helpful log messages when things break.

        指定者:
        identifyClassLoader 在接口中 FloraCoreBootstrap
        参数:
        classLoader - the classloader to identify
        返回:
        the name of the classloader source
        抛出:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
